request.description:
This collection has family total expense API, expense present value, fund with investments(get savings), and LTC APIs.
In the pre-req, this test, sets global variables for all downstream APIs.
In the tests, we calculate totalABD,ABCD,ABFD,ABGD,ABND,partB and partD premium surcharges for primary and spouse.
We also set 'from year' and 'to year'.
